mapper.select: select distinct g.gdsNum, g.gdsName, c.cateName, c.cateParent, gdsPrice, gdsStock, gdsDes, gdsDate from tbl_goods g inner join tbl_cate2 c where c.cateName = #{cateName}

select distinct a.gdsNum, a.gdsName, a.gdsPrice, a.cateParent, a.gdsStock, a.gdsDate from tbl_goods AS a left join tbl_cate1 AS b on a.cateParent = b.cateName left join tbl_cate2 AS c on b.cateName = c.cateName where cateParent = #{cateParent}
